```{r}
#Sampling Price data realizations
Price_Mean <- colMeans(Pricedata[,2:15])
#ntimes <- 100

Price_samples <- sample(Price_Mean, (ntimes^2)*length(Price_Mean),  replace = TRUE) %>% matrix(nrow = ntimes^2)

```
```{r}
devtools::load_all() 
```

```{r}

obj_Func_eval <- function(mean_sd_simulations, Price, t, ntimes){
  Total_Revenue_stat <- Total_Revenue_cal(mean_sd_simulations, Price, t, ntimes)
  
  #Calculating Robust objective for maximizing the objective function
  
  Risk_coeff <- 10^6
  
  Robust_obj <- Total_Revenue_stat[1] - ((Total_Revenue_stat[2]^2)/(2*Risk_coeff))
  
  obj_Func_eval <- -Robust_obj
}
  
  
```
```{r}
obj_Func_eval <- obj_Func_eval(mean_sd_simulations, Price_samples, t= 14, ntimes)
  
```
